title: My Points & Rewards
points_rule: You earn points with every completed order.
redeem_confirm_desc: Do you want to redeem "{rewardName}" for {rewardCost} points?
redeem_success_desc: The benefit has been applied to your account.
not_enough_points_desc: You need {cost} points to redeem this reward.
no_active_rules: There are no active ways to earn points right now.
rule_desc_bonusForAmount: Get a bonus of {points} points on orders over ${amount}.
rule_desc_fixedPointsPerOrder: Earn {points} fixed points for every completed order.
rule_desc_bonusForProduct: Earn {points} bonus points when you buy {productName}.
rule_desc_multiplierPerDay: Get a x{multiplier} point multiplier on {dayName}s.
rule_desc_firstOrderBonus: Get a one-time bonus of {points} points on your first order.
rule_desc_anniversaryBonus: Earn {points} points during your sign-up anniversary month.
rule_desc_bonusForVariety: Earn {points} bonus points if your order has more than {amount} different items.
rule_desc_bonusForCategory: Earn {points} bonus points for buying products from the '{categoryName}' category.
rule_desc_consecutiveBonus: Get a bonus of {points} points for ordering for {weeks} consecutive weeks.
